text: Enciso is a town and municipality in the Garc√≠a Rovira Province, part of Santander Department in northeastern Colombia. Founded on September 9, 1773 by Juan de Enciso, the liberating campaign of Simon Bolivar passed by this municipality on 7 occasions between the years 1814 and 1821. ==Other websites== * Official website Category:Municipalities of Colombia Category:Santander Department
title: Enciso
